title: [1.5.2/1.6.2/1.6.4][SSP/SMP]Novamenu[界面美化mod][不定期更新]
txt_content:
本帖最后由 185264646 于 2014-7-28 13:42 编辑 

  在论坛里乱逛时发现了这个mod,但可惜没有1.6.4版本,上Forums看了下,发现这个Mod早就更新了,可原搬运者未曾搬运,我就来搬一下,原搬运贴地址:http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=126514,介绍与1.5.2也在这里面（虽然原搬运贴内有1.6.2，但只更新到1.1.1，1.6.2的最后一个有效版本是1.1.2，本搬运贴已更新）
  1.6.4/1.6.2:http://pan.baidu.com/s/1eQdzVEE
  原作者:voidzm




QQ截图20140302202022.png (255.89 KB, 下载次数: 327)

下载附件

2014-3-2 20:21 上传








QQ截图20140302202039.png (311.01 KB, 下载次数: 327)

下载附件

2014-3-2 20:21 上传





更新记录:
Version 1.1.4:
- Fixed a bug where 1.6.4 servers would be indicated as an invalid version.

Version 1.1.3:
- Updated Novamenu to Minecraft 1.6.4.
- Fixed a bug where server disconnect messages were sometimes not shown.
- Added a mod count to the mod list screen.

Version 1.1.2:
- Enabled toggling of the in-game pause menu.

Version 1.1.1:
- Fixed a few network-related bugs, including an inability to connect to most 1.6.2 servers.

Version 1.1.0:
- Updated Novamenu to Minecraft 1.6.2.

Version 1.0.3: 
- Added a configuration system to allow some menus to be toggled on and off for compatibility.
- Added the "You Died!" screen to the GUI.
- Fixed some bugs, including one that prevented some disconnect messages from showing correctly.

Version 1.0.2:
- Fixed issues with Not Enough Items and CodeChickenCore.
- Tweaked the way that images are loaded for more flexibility.
- Removed a couple edge cases where normal Minecraft GUIs would be displayed.

Version 1.0.1:
- Fixed a bug that caused the Blocks and Items tabs in the Statistics screen to be switched.
- Fixed a crash occurring upon viewing the Optifine detail screen when Optifine is installed.
- Improved Optifine compatibility in general.

Version 1.0.0:
- Initial version.PS:貌似与Optifine及光影有点小冲突(在视频设置...与其所有子界面中会变成原来的界面,但不会崩溃.)(造成光影配置包选项不可见)
新人第一次发帖,求过!
